Key Match Events: Angola's goalkeeper Neblu received a straight red card for handling outside the penalty area
Gelson Dala scored the equalizer for Angola moments later
Namibia's Lubeni Pombili Haukongo received a second yellow card and was sent off
Dala scored his second goal from the resulting freekick
Mabululu scored the third goal for Angola on a counter-attack
Miscellaneous Highlights: This marked Angola's third appearance in the AFCON quarter-finals
Others: The match was played in the Africa Cup of Nations tournament
